2004 to 2006 World Tr ip

1995 to 1997 MAT Securitas Express Sa  
Position: Profit Center Manager  
International transports  
• Head of the "Art Transportation" department with a total of 15 employees  
• Responsible for the import and export of art obje cts by truck and air freight, as 
well as for the management of the stored works  
 
Successes  
• Exist against competition, which 20 years had built this branch and became a 
competitor.  
• No more customers lost in the first half of the year, no employee turnove r. 
Stabilization of business. Reduction of contracts with rented warehouses. 
Increase in sales by 20% in the following year  
• In the second year thereafter, resolution of a court case and thus reduction of 
accounts receivable by CHF 400,000. -with a sales v olume of approx. CHF 2.5 
- 3 million.  
 
1986 to 1994 Hinda ( Suisse) SA  
Position: Executive Assis tant 
Import and distribution of Honda vehicles in Switzerland (general importer)  
• Responsibility for sales administration and operational logistics; managing the 
import of vehicles and distribution to authorized dealer s.  
• Deputy Director of the "Transport" Department  
 
Successes  
• Idea and realization of a concept for barcode reading and automation of billing. 
Delivery throughout Switzerland within 24 -48 hrs.  
 
Result:  
• Cost reduction in sales administration. Efficient throughput warehouse -
customer and reduction of errors in clearing products. Shorter accounts 
receivable backlogs due to faster clearing. Increasing productivity in logistics.  
• Realization of the concept "Authorized Consignee" with the Customs District 
Directorate Bern  
 
1984 to 1 986 Panal pina AG

1982 to 1984 Haniel Internationale Transporte AG  
Position: Dispatcher  
Transport Company
